APPLICABLE)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a manager, you might need to cooperate with your team members’ Account team from time to time. For example, if an employee has concerns regarding the team he/she is working with and you would need to talk to the account staff to figure out the issue and see what could be done next. Alternatively, if your team member wants to move to another state/ location and you would need to work with the Account team to get all the necessary approvals for that purpose. You might need to reach out to the employee’s account leadership for various reasons, so it is important to know who your contact is. If you do not know who the AM/DM or a Team leader for your reports, you can check the project leadership staff in your report’s Telescope
